alert.note: Alert for Central Columbia River Gorge (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 09 at 3:13AM PST until December 10 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO NOON PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. * WHERE...In Oregon, Central Columbia River Gorge. In Washington, Central Columbia River Gorge. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to noon PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow level will stay near the Columbia River level through late tonight, then slowly rise Saturday morning, with snow levels rise to near 1000 feet.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
